name: Zero Memory
description:
Test your long term and short term memory in a simple little game called Zero Memory.

  • Two simple modes.
  • Responsive tones and art to help you remember the order.
  • Three different speeds to challenge the player's abilities.

Long Term works back only giving you the next sequence in the order. You must input all the moves in order, using only your memory.

Short Term is the same, but as you progress the sequence is completely changed each time the player gets it correct. Testing how well the player can remember something just presented to them.

Please enjoy the game. If you have any feedback/concerns then please tweet at me or email me.
